markets.title: Will Bitcoin reach $100k by end of 2025?
markets.description: This market resolves to YES if Bitcoin (BTC) reaches or exceeds $100,000 USD at any point before December 31, 2025 23:59:59 UTC. Otherwise resolves to NO.

markets.title: Will AI replace 50% of software developers by 2030?
markets.description: This market resolves to YES if credible surveys show that 50% or more of software development work is performed by AI systems by January 1, 2030. Otherwise resolves to NO.

markets.title: Will Solana TVL exceed $50B in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves to YES if Total Value Locked (TVL) on Solana blockchain exceeds $50 billion USD at any point during 2026, as measured by DeFiLlama. Otherwise resolves to NO.
